email_body:
Dearest friend,

I am very happy to inform you about my success in gettingthat fund Now, I want you to contact my secretary on the information below.

NAME: Mr Francis Emeka
EMAIL: francisemeka777@myway.com

Ask him to send to you the total sum of ($1,000,000.00)one million Dollars in A Certified bank draft which I kept for your compensation.And also your phone and home address.

Best Regards,
Dr Evans Goodluck
